columns.Code: A unique identifier assigned to each manufacturer.
columns.Name: The name of the manufacturer company.
columns.Headquarter: The location of the manufacturer's main office or headquarters.
columns.Founder: The name of the person who founded the manufacturer.
columns.Revenue: The annual revenue generated by the manufacturer, expressed in millions.

Manufacturers.table_description: The Manufacturers table contains essential information about various manufacturers, including their unique identifiers, names, headquarters, founders, and revenue figures.

columns.Code: A unique identifier for each product in the table.
columns.Name: The name or title of the product.
columns.Price: The cost of the product, typically represented in a currency format.
columns.Manufacturer: A reference to the manufacturer of the product, linking to the manufacturers table.

Products.table_description: The Products table contains information about various products available in the manufactory, including their identifiers, names, prices, and associated manufacturers.
